name: Collapse Search Bar
desc: Collapses the search bar to a button.

name: Floating Channel Bar
desc: Makes the channel bar float above the chat.

name: Compact User Panel
desc: Makes the user panel smaller and more compact.

name: Hide Timestamp
desc: Hides the timestamp in messages until hovered.

name: Compact User List
desc: Makes the user list smaller and more compact.

name: Remove Profile Reactions
desc: Removes the buttons to react to a profile.

name: Hide Self Ping
desc: Hides the ping highlight in messages sent by yourself.

name: Remove Quick React
desc: Removes the quick react buttons on messages.

name: Scrollable Code Blocks
desc: Makes code blocks not show the whole 2000km of code.

name: Widescreen Chat
desc: Makes the chat slimmer for wider screens.

name: Detailed Timestamp
desc: Makes the timestamps in messages use the full date.

name: Pin Search Page Switcher
desc: Pins the pages in the search. Why is this not a default

name: Activate Discord
desc: You didn't pirate Discord... did you?

name: Collapse Members List
desc: Collapses the members list until hovered.
